title: Closest Pair Algorithm Visualization
description: Implementation of closest pair in 2D via recursive splitting.

title: Probabilistically-sound beam search with masked language models
description: Using masked language models for infilling with better approximations of joint distributions.

title: Revisiting assumptions in scRNA-seq foundation model encodings
description: Diving into the rank-value encoding scheme used in training scRNA-seq foundation models.

description: Working through the exercises in a canonical reinforcement learning textbook.

title: Bioinformatics Toolkit
description: Collection of Python tools for common bioinformatics operations like FASTA/FASTQ parsing, global and local alignment, and k-mer generation.

title: mtAnnotate
description: Utility for transferring genome annotations between mitochondiral genomes.
